name: Murder in Zhao's
description:
Horizon Roleplay community based thriller and mystery game.

You were falsely banned from HZRP. You tried to contact Zhao about it but you are not getting any response. It's been months, You are getting worried and you decide to meet Zhao in real life. You book a ticket to the Netherlands, and make it to Zhao's house. You discover a horrific truth about Zhao. Move around the house, collect clues and find the truth behind what happened and who did it.
